author: rcm
msg: The application library's ApplicationException is converted to an NOF exception for all reflective calls.

author: rcm
msg: Restructured framework exception hierachy - all are now runtime exceptions.

author: rcm
msg: InternalReflector is used to handle exception objects.

author: rcm
msg: NakedObjectSpecification now sees Exception classes as internal object - like java.* classes, and will not use the plugin reflector to use them.
